keywords: ['soul', 'low quality', 'instrumental', 'marimba melody', 'shimmering shakers', 'tinny metallic percussive elements', 'punchy kick', 'syncopate snare hits', 'low quality', 'mono', 'room microphone']
caption: The Soul Instrumental features an addictive marimba melody, shimmering shakers, punchy kick hits, syncopated snare and tinny metallic percussive elements. It sounds narrow because it is recorded with one mono room microphone and therefore it is a low quality recording.
